item.title: Implementing the openssl_encrypt method of PHP using Java
item.author: 1216062928@qq.com (Who)
item.description: ä½¿ç”¨ Java å®ç° PHP openssl_encryptåŠ å¯†æ–¹æ³• PHP Implement public static function encrypt($input, $key) { $data = openssl_encrypt($input, 'AES-128-ECB', $key, OPENSSL_RAW_DATA); $data = base64_encode($data); return $data; } public static function decrypt($input, $key) { $decrypted = openssl_decrypt(base64_decode($input), 'AES-128-ECB', $key, OPENSSL_RAW_DATA); return $decrypted; } Java Implement public static String encrypt(String data, String password) throws
